spl_product_data_elements: Joint And Bone Cream ALLANTOIN MENAQUINONE 7 MENAQUINONE 7 ARNICA CHAMISSONIS FLOWER ARNICA CHAMISSONIS FLOWER DIMETHYL SULFONE DIMETHYL SULFONE SODIUM BUTYROYL/FORMOYL HYALURONATE GLUCOSAMINE GLUCOSAMINE ALLANTOIN
active_ingredient: Active Ingredient(s) MENAQUINONE-7、ARNICA CHAMISSONIS FLOWER EXTRACT、SODIUM BUTYROYL/FORMOYL CHONDROITIN SULFATE 、GLUCOSAMINE、DIMETHYL SULFONE
purpose: Purpose Reduce discomfort, improve joint flexibility, and help restore daily activities.
when_using: Use 1. Clean and dry the skin of the joint area. 2. Take an appropriate amount of cream and apply it evenly on the joints. 3. Massage gently in circular motions with your hands until absorbed.
warnings: Warnings Please keep out of reach of children.Do not swallow.Please clean your hands before use to ensure the best results from the product.Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash occur.Store in a cool and dry place.
do_not_use: Do not use Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash occur.
stop_use: STOP USE Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash occur.
keep_out_of_reach_of_children: Please keep out of reach of children. Do not swallow.
storage_and_handling: Avoid freezing and excessive heat above 40C (104F) ） Store in a cool and dry place.

spl_product_data_elements: XIMONTH Bee Venom Pain Cream ALLANTOIN GLUCOSAMINE GLUCOSAMINE MENAQUINONE 7 MENAQUINONE 7 ARNICA CHAMISSONIS FLOWER ARNICA CHAMISSONIS FLOWER ALLANTOIN DIMETHYL SULFONE DIMETHYL SULFONE SODIUM BUTYROYL/FORMOYL HYALURONATE
active_ingredient: Active Ingredient(s) ARNICA CHAMISSONIS FLOWER EXTRACT、GLUCOSAMINE、SODIUM BUTYROYL/FORMOYL CHONDROITIN SULFATE、 MENAQUINONE-7、DIMETHYL SULFONE
purpose: Purpose Absorbed through the skin, a variety of plant ingredients penetrate into the joints, dissolve uric acid crystals, soothe swelling, and reduce pain and discomfort.
when_using: Use 1. Clean and dry the affected area of ​​skin. 2. Take an appropriate amount of cream and apply it evenly on the skin. 3. Massage gently with your hands in circular motions for absorption. 4. Use it 2-3 times a day for better results.
warnings: Warnings Please keep out of reach of children.Do not swallow.Please clean your hands before use to ensure the best results from the product.Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash occur.Store in a cool and dry place.
do_not_use: Do not use Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash occur.
stop_use: STOP USE Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash occur.
keep_out_of_reach_of_children: Please keep out of reach of children. Do not swallow.
storage_and_handling: Avoid freezing and excessive heat above 40C (104F) ） Store in a cool and dry place.

spl_product_data_elements: Medison Bell Pill Patch Tourmaline, Magnesium sulfate, Dimethyl Sulfone, Glucosamine Medison Bell Pill PatchTablet Tourmaline, Magnesium sulfate, Dimethyl Sulfone, Glucosamine MINERAL OIL MENTHOL GLUCOSAMINE GLUCOSAMINE DIMETHYL SULFONE DIMETHYL SULFONE MAGNESIUM SULFATE MAGNESIUM CATION 40x40mm Medison Bell Pill PatchCapsule Tourmaline, Magnesium sulfate, Dimethyl Sulfone, Glucosamine MINERAL OIL MENTHOL GLUCOSAMINE GLUCOSAMINE DIMETHYL SULFONE DIMETHYL SULFONE MAGNESIUM SULFATE MAGNESIUM CATION 122x85mm
active_ingredient: Tourmaline, Magnesium sulfate, Dimethyl Sulfone, Glucosamine
purpose: Effective for relieving muscle stiffness and joint pain.
warnings: 1. Do not use if you have skin conditions, eczema, or allergies. 2. If you experience swelling, pain, or red spots on the skin during use, stop using immediately and consult a physician. 3. Recommended use is up to 8 hours per day. 4. Store any unused patches in the resealable pouch to maintain effectiveness. 5. Keep out of reach of infants and children. 6. Do not use for purposes other than intended, and keep away from fire. 7. Avoid storing in temperatures above 30°C or in direct sunlight. Keep out of reach of children.
keep_out_of_reach_of_children: Keep out of reach of children.
dosage_and_administration: 1. Please clean the application area to remove any moisture or debris before use. 2. Peel the patch from the transparent film and place it on the desired area, pressing down firmly around the edges.
inactive_ingredient: Mineral Oil, Hydrogenated polycyclopentadiene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Butadiene Copolymer, Menthol,

generic_name: TOURMALINE, MAGNESIUM SULFATE, DIMETHYL SULFONE, GLUCOSAMINE
